title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 612.6 - Screening process
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 612.6 - Screening process

State Regulations
(a) All applications for panel
membership shall be screened by the central screening committee. (b) The committee, in
accordance with standards for admission to the panels, entitled "General

Requirements for All Applicants to the Indigent Defendants Legal Panel", shall
make a determination as to whether an applicant is qualified for membership on
any of the panels. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
612.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
